channel.title: Dds Specz V2 | Bran New Server | Need Staff | Awsome Combat | Come Play!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2je2xkn.png[/img]
Hey guys we are in beta stage atm and i am just putting this online just so that i can see if people can find some bugs issues that i have yet not to be found. But here are some features to the server..
[COLOR="Blue"] [url=http://dds-specz.enjin.com/]Website[/url]
[url=http://dds-specz.enjin.com/webclient]Webclient[/url][/COLOR]
[COLOR="Red"]Features:[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"]Flawless Combat Clipped Following Clipped Combat following i forgot what item models but 565+ item models 2 Custom interfaces Ancient Curses Re Wrote combat system Oldschool Gameframe Cacke Szie is around 10-18kb Duel Arena Soulsplit Base I rewrote max hit forumla's for mage/melee/range Redid the spec max hits Npc+Player Clipped Following Correct Dragon Claws spec Formula Better defense system. All Barrows set affects works. Rs type stats. Perfect bonus's Near rs combat. Old school Gramframe Newer item models[/COLOR]
[COLOR="Blue"]Now what you have all been waiting for!
Pictures:[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/5511/95de6ccbf3ce4d75a0425b4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/3416/93ce8e76ca1442a58a98830.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6m1Nv0h.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/3476/f3fc52525ad740c8bc4139d.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8674/c00eda50b6b44b10b17736b.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/2739/a3aa0d843b874513819f503.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8641/ddef4dabbe604447ade498a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/3876/ce37c675eaf449b4a50d77e.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/451/a5efe0d9c0d049ce972e120.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/7748/55879d586e4a4b25843be0b.png[/img] Fail attempt at getting the ags spec picture but that is the ags spec.
[IMG]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/4289/03efdf3554a24fee932dcb4.png[/img]
Credits go to: Soulsplit R-S Community and my self.[/CENTER]
[SIZE="5"][COLOR="Red"]NOTE:This WAS my first server i coded and i decided to use this again and learn more things with this base cause i don't think I'm a great coder like the rest of the community. So why not start from where i first started.[/COLOR][/SIZE]

item.dc:creator: @DdsSpecz DdsSpecz
item.description:
@DdsSpecz wrote:

[CENTER]

Hey guys we are in beta stage atm and i am just putting this online just so that i can see if people can find some bugs issues that i have yet not to be found. But here are some features to the server…

[COLOR=“Blue”] Website

Webclient[/COLOR]

[COLOR=“Red”]Features:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=“Lime”]Flawless Combat
Clipped Following
Clipped Combat following
i forgot what item models but 565+ item models
2 Custom interfaces
Ancient Curses
Re Wrote combat system
Oldschool Gameframe
Cacke Szie is around 10-18kb
Duel Arena
Soulsplit Base
I rewrote max hit forumla’s for mage/melee/range
Redid the spec max hits
Npc+Player Clipped Following
Correct Dragon Claws spec Formula
Better defense system.
All Barrows set affects works.
Rs type stats.
Perfect bonus’s
Near rs combat.
Old school Gramframe
Newer item models[/COLOR]

[COLOR=“Blue”]Now what you have all been waiting for!

Pictures:[/COLOR]

Fail attempt at getting the ags spec picture but that is the ags spec.

Credits go to:
Soulsplit
R-S Community
and my self.[/CENTER]

[SIZE=“5”][COLOR=“Red”]NOTE:This WAS my first server i coded and i decided to use this again and learn more things with this base cause i don’t think I’m a great coder like the rest of the community. So why not start from where i first started.[/COLOR][/SIZE]
